result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tony Luseur Gipson

Defendant Tony Luseur Gipson appeared by video.  Attorney Wendy Ann Patrickus appeared by video for Tony Luseur Gipson.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE. Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests another status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.
Status conference scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Tony Luseur Gipson in court.  Attorney Wendy Ann Patrickus in court for Tony Luseur Gipson.  Attorney Stephanie Krueger in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a. Case adjourned to Branch 40.
Status conference scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Tony Luseur Gipson in court with attorney Wendy Ann Patrickus.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Tony Luseur Gipson appeared by video means with Attorney.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of case #08CF2278. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer D. Tierney. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Court enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. 
Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Attorney Wendy Patrickus

Defendant Tony Luseur Gipson in court with Attorney Wendy Ann Patrickus.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. Defense moves to dismiss; motion is taken under advisement. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Tony Luseur Gipson in court with attorney Wendy Ann Patrickus.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 6-27-2022 @1:30p

Case is adjourned back to OCCR to allow time for defendant's retained attorney to return from medical leave.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
